a.aria-label: Contact Us - Contact Us - Staff Directory

div.h2: New at Three Lakes School District

div.p: Need help during this time? Contact the Three Lakes Food Pantry.
These dates are now rest days for students: May 1, 6, 15, 20.
For coronavirus (COVID-19) updates from the district, please visit our dedicated information page.
The open enrollment period in Wisconsin starts on Feb. 3 and runs through April 30. Contact us today to enroll at TLSD!

div.h2: We Are Three Lakes School District
div.p: Three Lakes School District is located in the heart of the Northwoods where we're surrounded by lakes, national forests and plenty of wildlife. Here, bald eagles, loons, white-tailed deer and black bears are commonplace. But so is a community spirit so strong that it rubs off on our students and infiltrates our school.

If you are interested in learning more about Sugar Camp Elementary, Three Lakes Elementary, Three Lakes Junior High, or Three Lakes High School, please click on the links to the right. We can't wait to show you what #BluejayCommunity is all about.

p.span: Good afternoon, Jays! We have a few dates to share with you as we head toward the next phase of the closure. The administrative team has set teacher prep days, student study days and material drop off...
What do you do when you're a teacher and you're missing your littles? Ms. Griesbach organized a little drive-by earlier this week so she could wave to her students. She sent out an email and then...

address.a: 6930 West School Street, Three Lakes, WI 54562
